document.heading: Self-Sufficiency Promotion Temporary Amendment Act of 1998

history.narrative: Law 12-230, the “Self-Sufficiency Promotion Temporary Amendment Act of 1998,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-557. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 5, 1998, and July 30, 1998, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 18, 1998, it was assigned Act No. 12-443 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-230 became effective on April 20, 1999.
